name: lapis lazuli and sterling silver cufflinks
description:
classic lapis lazuli cufflinks but with a modern twist

smooth mid blue lapis tablets wrapped in sterling silver wire and set in a chain cufflink setting

stones measure 13mm by 18mm

name: eccentrics glass and sterling cufflinks
description:
modern and stylish powder blue glass with dark dichroic inserts set into a fine silver and sterling traditional cufflink setting

cabachons were handcrafted by http://willowglass.etsy.com 
unique and one of a kind cufflinks - just for you

face measures approximately 16mm diameter


Please note, this item is currently on display. I will be making more eccentrics cufflinks (square and round) but with different glass cabachons. Please enquire for availability, styles and colours.
Thank you

For more examples of my cufflinks please visit http://www.flickr.com/photos/pomomama/sets/72157602323637190/

name: blue resin and sterling wired cufflinks
description:
blue resin wired cufflinks
fresh and funky resin discs wired into a sterling silver chain cufflink setting 
light in weight but not in style

suitable for formal with a bit of pzazz, or casual
black and white is never out of style, but always classy

discs measure 15 mm diameter (just over ½ inch) by ¼ inch (4 mm) thick
please note, these will be custom made for your order - allow 3 days before item is ready for shipping

name: carnelian and sterling silver wired cufflinks
description:
beautiful chunky square carnelian stones wired into a sterling silver cufflink setting 

suitable for formal or casual
stunning deep red translucent stones

stones measure approximately 20mm square (¾ inch) by ¼ inch (5mm) thick

Please note, this is a custom item and stones will therefore vary slightly from those shown. Please allow 3 days from order for shipping out.

These are also available in moss agate, blackstone, fused glass (periwinkle frit), bronzite (squares only), ocean jasper, picasso (black and white) jasper and white quartz (rectangles). Please see http://www.flickr.com/photos/pomomama/sets/72157602323637190/ for more product illustrations. Please use the Contact feature on this site to message me with enquiries.

name: glass and sterling silver wired cufflinks
description:
glass swirl wired cufflinks
beautiful chunky glass squares wired into a sterling silver cufflink setting 

suitable for formal or casual
swirls of colour in a smokey glass setting

glass measures 19mm by 12mm (¾ by ½ inch) by ¼ inch (5mm) thick

This is a custom item - glass will be similar but not identical to that shown. Please allow 3 days before shipping.
